name: Road Trip USA
description:
Take a Road Trip across the beautiful landscape of the United States of America in this relaxing hidden object game with fun puzzle mini games
20 stunning scene locations to visit
Multiple hidden object modes:
- Word
- Riddle
- Scramble
- Missing Vowels
- Silhouette
- Night mode! Can you find the items in the dark with just a flashlight?
4 mini game puzzles
- Match 3
- Mahjong
- Block slide
- Spot the Differences
Plus, find all the shields in every scene location to unlock extra bonus puzzles.
40 and counting with more added with new updates.
